name: Speedrun Through Boardgame Design Patterns of the 21st Century
description: As a scholar and collector of boardgames, I have had the pleasure of thinking critically through over 700 titles, looking for innovation in design patterns. In this talk, I highlights 10 of the most successful and suggest how their mechanism design can be adapted to AWs.

speakers.name: William Robinson
speakers.bio: Mentor at Alliance Accelerator | PhD in Game Studies | Former Forensic Crypto Auditor
